identity.mission: Create a mystical, luxurious, and professional mentorship portal that feels like a sanctuary, not a SaaS.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix spiritual warmth with high-end luxury tech.
Emotion First: Every screen must evoke 'Serenity' and 'Elevation'.
Content is King: The mentorship content is the hero; UI is the vessel.
Zoom In: Focus on intimate details (gold borders, subtle grain).
Negative Space: Allow the user to breathe; do not clutter the spiritual journey.

heading.usage: All H1-H3 headings, quotes, and key metrics.

backgrounds.description: Abstract dark geometry for subtle background overlays (low opacity)
Golden light/window for hero section atmosphere

dashboard.description: Woman writing/journaling - use for 'Diagnosis' or 'Tasks' card
Woman sitting/meditating - use for 'My Mentorship' or 'Sessions' card

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text unless it is a very large headline.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use #0B1120 or #020617.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6+).

setup: Install fonts: 'Cormorant Garamond' and 'Manrope' via Google Fonts in index.css.
Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above.
Set the global body background to #0B1120 and text to #F8FAFC.
implementation: Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Sidebar (Glassmorphism) and Main Content Area.
Use the 'Bento' grid system for the Dashboard overview.
Implement the 'Card' component with the specified glassmorphism and hover effects.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections (e.g., Diagnosis card, Sessions card).
Ensure the 'Gold' accent is used sparingly for high-value actions (Primary Buttons, Active States, Key Metrics).
